enumdef.name: lv_bar_mode
enumdef.help: How the bar grows with values

enum.name: normal
enum.help: Make the bar grow from minimum toward maximum

enum.name: symmetrical
enum.help: Make the bar grow symmetrically from the midpoint

enum.name: range
enum.help: Make the bar show values between start and end points

enum.name: auto
enum.help: Choose orientation automatically based on widget size

enum.name: horizontal
enum.help: Make the bar fill left to right

enum.name: vertical
enum.help: Make the bar fill bottom to top

prop.name: min_value
prop.help: Set the minimum value of the bar

prop.name: max_value
prop.help: Set the maximum value of the bar

prop.name: value
prop.help: Set the current value of the bar

param.name: animated
param.help: Animate the bar when changing its value. Reference as `value-animated`

prop.name: start_value
prop.help: Set the start value in range mode

param.name: start_value
param.help: The left/start value of the bar in range mode

param.name: animated
param.help: Animate the bar when changing its start value. Reference as `start_value-animated`

prop.name: bind_value
prop.help: Bind the bar’s value to a subject
